alert.note: Alert for Peoria (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Central Illinois (Central and East Central Illinois)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 19 at 12:57PM CDT until April 19 at 1:15PM CDT by NWS Central Illinois
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 115 PM CDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN PEORIA COUNTY... At 1256 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Trivoli, or 11 miles northeast of Canton, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. Locations impacted include... Hanna City, Bartonville, Bellevue, Peoria and West Peoria. This includes the following highways... Interstate 474 between mile markers 2 and 6. Interstate 74 between mile markers 76 and 84. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
